spells.name: Worthless Magic
spells.description:
The target cannot use two spells with names specified by the caster for the duration of the spell.

This spell can be cast multiple times on the same target, as long as two different spells are specified each time.
spells.summary: Two spells are forbidden to use

spells.name: Possession
spells.description:
This spell pulls the soul of a dead Humanoid or Barbarous into the caster's body, allowing the dead being to speak and interact with the living world. The caster can communicate his wishes to the souls but cannot interfere with their actions. No class or combat feats (either those of the caster or known by the dead person before death) can be used.

If the caster holds an item associated with the deceased, the caster can specify a specific soul to be summoned. Otherwise, the most recently deceased Humanoid or Barbarous character within a 100-meter radius around the caster will be summoned.

This magic has no effect if the specified character has been reanimated or if their soul has already been reincarnated. The same is true if the caster doesn't specify a target and there are no dead people within 100m of the caster.
spells.summary: Bring dead souls into the caster's body

spells.name: Holy War
spells.description:
To be a target of this spell, the target must be equipped with, hold, or carry the holy symbol of the caster's deity. The caster or characters of None, Animal, and Servant intellect cannot be the target.

The target selects a Warrior-Type class, temporarily increasing the class by 3 levels. It is also possible to select a class without levels and receive it as equivalent to 3rd level. The target's Adventurer Level remains unchanged, and no new Combat Feats will be obtained.

If a creature with monster data becomes a target, it receives a +3 bonus to Accuracy and Evasion checks and +3 points to the physical damage it causes by melee and ranged attacks.
spells.summary: Strengthen those of the same faith (Warrior-Type Classes +3 levels)

spells.name: ⏩Stun Bullet
spells.description: This spell creates a bullet which deals Power 10 + Magic Power magic damage. If this bullet strikes a character, the caster makes a Spellcasting check, and the target must make a Willpower save against this Spellcasting check. If this save fails, the character cannot use any Minor Actions or declare Active Combat Feats for an additional 10 seconds (1 round).
spells.summary: Infuses bullet with Power 10 and mild paralysis

spells.name: Cremation
spells.description: Deals Power 20 + Magic Power magic damage. If the target is Undead, Magitech, or a Construct, it takes an extra 5 points of damage, even if it succeeds in resisting.
spells.summary: Deals Power 20 damage, +5 to Undead and Constructs

spells.name: Storm Friend*
spells.description:
Creates a place blessed by Furusil.

Physical and magic damage of Water/Ice or Wind types caused by the target increases by 2 points. Further, if the target receives physical or magical damage of these types, that damage is reduced by 2 points.
spells.summary: Increases or reduces Water/Ice and Wind-Type damage
spells.divinity: Furusil, Goddess of Wind and Rain

spells.name: Soul Eater
spells.description:
Forcibly absorbs mana from an Abyss Gate which the caster has opened.

The Warlock restores their MP equal to their Warlock Level. The Warlock also receives a -1 penalty to their Banish checks for the following hour.

This effect can only be used once per day and only while summoning Daemons from an Abyss Gate.
spells.summary: Restores MP by Warlock Class Level; Banish check -1

spells.name: Blindness*
spells.description: If the target fails to resist, it is blinded. This does not affect creatures with Magical or Mechanical senses.
spells.summary: Robs the target of sight

spells.name: Clipping Weapon*
spells.description:
Hurts weakened targets.

If the target has half or less HP, all melee and ranged attacks gain +1 bonus to Accuracy and +2 to damage dealt.
spells.summary: Accuracy +1 and damage +2 against target with half or less HP

spells.name: Invisibility
spells.description:
The caster becomes completely invisible to any character whose perception is Five Senses (including Darkvision) or Mechanical. They remain visible to characters with Magical perception.

Note: Fairy Magic of the Light type has no effect on Constructs, Magitech, or Undead.
spells.summary: Makes caster invisible

spells.name: Tactile Illusion
spells.description:
Creates illusions that deceive the sense of touch.

The size of the illusion is limited to a 3m radius. There are no images, sounds, or smells associated with the illusion; it can only be felt. The sensations can be recreated in a variety of hardnesses and softnesses, from iron sheets to feather comforters. The caster can decide how the surface will feel, from smooth marble to rough sandstone to fluffy fur. However, no matter how "hard" the caster makes it, perceivers will not collide with this illusion, and no damage will occur.

This spell can be combined with the [Illusion] (8th-level Spiritualism spell) and [Thermal Illusion] (8th level Deep Magic).

This spell can also be used to change a character's or object's tactile feel. In this case, if the illusioned object or character moves, the illusion will move accordingly.
spells.summary: Creates illusions that deceive the sense of touch

spells.name: ⏩Harvest Field*
spells.description: Temporarily imbues the target with the restorative power of a giant tree. If the target is affected by an effect that restores HP, the amount of HP restored will be doubled.
spells.summary: HP recovery doubled

spells.name: Evil Silhouette
spells.description:
Creates an illusory image of a Daemon on the spot. The illusion does not move but remains in place. If the caster touches the illusion, the caster's voice can be made to appear as if the illusion is speaking. A character who sees this illusion must perform a Detect Check (see CR I, p. 111) with the success value of the Spellcasting Check as the Target Number. If it fails, the target mistakes the illusion for a Daemon. The illusion is treated as a shield by the hostile character.

The illusion is easily negated by an attack or other harmful actions, at which time the spell loses its effect.
spells.summary: Create the illusion of a Daemon

spells.name: Telephony
spells.description:
Transforms the magisphere into a handset. Other characters can hear the caster's voice transmitted through the handset. Only the caster's voice can be transmitted, and the range is limited to 1km (small)/10km (medium)/50km (large), depending upon the size of the magisphere used.

The caster can only have one magisphere transformed with this spell at a time.
spells.summary: Creates a handset to transfer messages across distances

spells.name: ⏩△Mind Protector
spells.description: Belladonna's Spirit protects the target, which, for the duration of the effect, will not suffer any Psychic-type damage or unwanted effects. Any effects of the Psychic type that the target has already received are also removed.
spells.summary: Protects the target from and removes Psychic effects

spells.name: ⏩△Abyss Slayer*
spells.description:
Enhances the target's ability to counter threats within the Shallows. If the target is in a Shallows or an environment deemed equivalent by the GM and during the duration of this spell is affected by [Sacred Weapon] or [Vice Weapon], the character benefiting from that effect will also be affecting Daemons and their damage will be increased by an additional +1 point (total +3 points).

Similarly, if affected by [Sacred Shield] or [Vice Shield], the character benefiting from that effect will also be affecting Daemons, and their Defense will be increased by an additional +1 point (total +4 points).

The [Sacred Weapon] or [Sacred Shield] enhanced by this effect will remain effective even if wielded on someone other than the caster for its duration.
spells.summary: Enhances [Sacred …] and [Vice …] spells within Shallows

spells.name: Confusing Fog*
spells.description:
The caster creates a thick fog around themselves that obstructs recognition, making it difficult to distinguish between friend and foe.

If the target targets a character other than themselves, the target must be chosen at random from among all possible characters that could be the target of the action (e.g., all characters in the skirmish if it is a melee attack).

After one random target selection, the spell for this target becomes "Resistance: Negates."
spells.summary: Makes it impossible to distinguish friend from foe

spells.name: Force Explosion
spells.description: Creates intense shockwaves around the caster, dealing Power 30 + Magic Power magical damage.
spells.summary: Deals Power 30 damage

spells.name: ⏩Homing Laser
spells.description: This spell can only target bullets enhanced with [Laser Bullet], giving the bullet the power to bend at will. Grants a +2 bonus to Accuracy when shooting a [Laser Bullet].
spells.summary: Accuracy checks +2 for [Laser Bullet]

spells.name: Leap to Gate
spells.description: The Caster transports themselves to any Abyss Gate which they have opened. The caster can move freely without regard to shielding, obstructions, or movement interference, but if the caster and the Abyss Gate are more than 10 meters apart, the spell will have no effect.
spells.summary: Teleport to the Abyss Gate

spells.name: ⏩Burst Shot
spells.description:
Rapid-fires three bullets as one shot. The bullets deal Power 30 + Magic Power magic damage to a single target if they hit. When making this attack, the caster receives a +2 bonus to Accuracy.

If the caster doesn't currently have at least three bullets loaded in their gun, this spell fails.
spells.summary: Gives Accuracy +2 and Power 30 by firing three bullets in a row as one shot

spells.name: Effect Weapon
spells.description:
Whenever the target makes a melee or ranged attack, the weapon used in the attack is considered a magic weapon (which still deals physical damage), and the physical damage it deals is increased by 1.

Additionally, the caster imbues attacks with one of the following elemental types: Fire, Water/Ice, Earth, Wind, or Lightning. The type is chosen by the caster at the time of casting and cannot be changed or omitted after casting.
spells.summary: Applies magical effects to a weapon and allows it to strike with typed damage

spells.name: ⏩Healing Bullet
spells.description:
This spell creates a bullet that heals wounds. The bullet heals Power 0 + Magic Power HP if it hits. The bullet hits as long as the caster does not score an automatic failure on the roll.

This spell does not affect Undead, Constructs, or Magitech.
spells.summary: Makes a healing bullet that heals with Power 0

spells.name: ⏩Treat Bullet
spells.description:
This spell creates a bullet that heals wounds. The bullet heals Power 30 + Magic Power damage if it hits. The bullet hits as long as the caster does not score an automatic failure on the roll. Regardless of the gun used to fire it, no critical hits will occur when using the Power Table.

This spell does not affect Undead, Constructs or Magitech.
spells.summary: Makes a healing bullet that heals with Power 30

spells.name: Panic Run
spells.description: If the target is within a skirmish during the duration of this spell, it must withdraw from the skirmish on its turn. Otherwise, it must make preparations to leave the melee. If the target is not in a skirmish, this effect does not occur, but it also cannot move into a skirmish with its movement.
spells.summary: Scares the target and makes them flee the battle

spells.name: Soul Drain
spells.description:
The target takes Power 40 + Magic Power points of damage to both HP and MP.

If the target fails to resist, the Caster recovers 10 points of both HP and MP per target.
spells.summary: Power 40 damage to HP and MP; caster heals

spells.name: Three Storms*
spells.description:
The target is captured by the swirling wind and shaken violently.

The target is dealt Power 10 + Magic Power Wind-type magic damage. If the target has more than one section, the damage to all sections is increased by 2 points for each section over 1 (for example, +6 points for a 4-section monster). This additional damage occurs even if the target succeeds in resisting.
spells.summary: Deals Power 10 damage; damage increases if 2+ Sections
spells.divinity: Furusil, Goddess of Wind and Rain

spells.name: Frenzy*
spells.description:
Extinguishes fear and drives all affected into a blind fury.

All those affected by this spell will fight to the death as long as they detect any hostile characters.

While affected by [Frenzy], a character cannot be affected by any Psychic-type effects, and they increase all damage dealt (physical or magical) by 2 points.
spells.summary: Focuses target on fighting and increases its damage

spells.name: Summon Fairy IV
spells.description: This spell is identical to [Summon Fairy], except the monster level of the fairy to be called is 9.
spells.summary: Calls and uses a level 9 Fairy

spells.name: Sanity
spells.description: Dispels all Psychic-type spells and abilities on the target. The success value must be compared for each effect to be canceled.
spells.summary: Restores the target to his normal state of mind

spells.name: Apport
spells.description:
The caster may mark an item in advance and teleport it to their location by casting this spell. Marked items cannot be more than 3m in any dimension and can include items magically created by the caster (including golems). An object may only have one mark. The object must be at least one week old before it can be a target for this spell.

The caster can draw a number of marks equal to their Sorcerer Level, which takes one hour per object to draw. If a caster tries to exceed this number of marks, one of the previous marks will be removed randomly.

A mark is permanent until erased or the object is destroyed. If another mark is drawn on an item, the first mark is disabled.

This spell can be used without the caster having a Magical Implement (see CR I, p. 176) on hand.
spells.summary: Teleports marked item to the caster

spells.name: Avoid Fairy
spells.description:
A targeted fairy of level 15 or lower will be banished back to the fairies' home dimension. The target will not return until it is called again by some means.

MP cost of this spell is equal to the target’s level. If multiple targets are selected simultaneously with the [—-feat:metamagic-targets |Metamagic/Targets]]]] combat feat, MP cost is the sum of MP required for each target.
spells.summary: Drives a Fairy away

spells.name: Delicious Satisfaction*
spells.description:
Caster gains satisfaction from the quantity and value of the food they eat.

The caster gains +3 maximum HP by eating a meal worth at least 100 gamel for the duration of the spell. Their current HP is also increased (recovered) by 3 points. Regardless of the amount of food, the caster will gain this effect if they eat food worth 100 gamel or more.

This effect can only be obtained once per day.
spells.summary: 100 gamel worth of meals provide +3 max HP

spells.name: Daemon's Seed
spells.description:
Creates a Daemon's Seed, which turns Humanoids and Barbarous into "Daemon Seminarium" (see Monstrous Lore, p. 37).

This spell requires one hour to cast. It can only be cast once a day.
spells.summary: Create a Daemon's Seed

spells.name: ⏩Glider Cloak
spells.description:
The caster transforms their magisphere into a glider, allowing the caster to fly. For an additional 3MP, this spell can also launch the character into the air from a standing start.

Movement Speed in the air is 20m per round.
spells.summary: Fly in the sky with a magical cloak

spells.name: △Atrophy
spells.description: Causes the target to take -2 to their Initiative. This spell is cast just before the target's Initiative Check is made. It can be cast multiple times on different targets.
spells.summary: Initiative Check -2

spells.name: Lucky Coin*
spells.description:
This spell imbues an ordinary coin with exceptional luck which can save the caster from unexpected danger. It might only be a coin which brings good fortune, or a coin that the caster has in their pocket that deflects a fatal blow.

If the caster performs a Notice check, Danger Sense check, Spot Trap check, or Death Check within the spell's duration, they gain a +4 bonus modifier.

If the caster does not have any money, this spell will not work. If the spell's effect is invoked, the caster's money is reduced by 1 gamel.

This effect occurs automatically when the opportunity to perform one of the above checks arises, and the spell ends once the effect occurs.
spells.summary: Can slightly avert a deadly situation

spells.name: ⏩△Precognition*
spells.description: This spell predicts the near future. For the duration of the spell, the caster can choose to use a fixed roll of 4 and 4 (for a total of 8) instead of rolling 2d for any check they perform.
spells.summary: Roll for any skill check 8 instead of 2d

spells.name: Summon Fairy VI
spells.description: This spell is identical to [Summon Fairy], except the monster level of the fairy to be called is 13.
spells.summary: Calls and uses a level 13 Fairy

spells.name: ⏩△Cold Protector
spells.description: Frost Panther's Spirit protects the target, which suffers no damage and no unwanted effects of the Water/Ice type for the duration of the effect. Any effects of the Water/Ice type that the target has already received are not removed, but are temporarily suspended for the duration of the spell.
spells.summary: Fully protects the target from Water/Ice

spells.name: Create Golem
spells.description:
The caster creates a Golem and gives it a command to act. For more information, see "Golems and Undead" (CR II p. 87, or Magus Arts p. 86).

Casting this spell takes one hour.

See also: Common Abilities of Golems, Golem Enhancing Items

spells.name: Remote Key
spells.description: Remotely manipulate a lock or key with [Lock] (1st level Truespeech spell) or [Unlock] (3rd level Truespeech spell).
spells.summary: Remotely manipulate a key

spells.description: Lunoicos' Spirit attacks the target. Roll 2d and determine the physical damage to be dealt to the target using the table below.

spells.summary: Deals (18-36 + Magic Power) physical damage

spells.name: ⏩△Daemons' Spread
spells.description:
The caster disperses their body like a swarm of Daemons, making them less susceptible to one particular type of effect.

The Caster chooses one effect: Fire, Water/Ice, Wind, Earth, Lightning, Bludgeoning, Slashing, Energy, Poison, Disease, Curse, or Psychic, and halves (or quarters, if successfully resisting a "Resistance: Half" Spell) the physical or magic damage dealt by that type.

This spell overlaps as long as a different type is specified.
spells.summary: Half damage from typed damage

spells.name: ⏩Re-Command
spells.description:
Allows the caster to suppress the attempts by Daemons to act on their own accord for a moment.

For the duration of this spell, whenever the caster's Daemon acts according to the "Daemon Action Chart", the caster can reroll the 1d roll on the chart once. This reroll must be immediately after the original chart roll.

After the reroll, the previous result is discarded, and the new roll must be applied and cannot be canceled (see Monstrous Lore, p. 32).

Once this spell effect has been applied, it is automatically negated.
spells.summary: The "Daemon Action Chart" roll can be rerolled once

spells.name: Flash Shield*
spells.description: A force field of light surrounds and protects the target, reducing physical and magical damage against the target by 5 points per attack.
spells.summary: Damage to target -5

spells.name: ⏩Targeting Sight
spells.description: The caster gains a +1 bonus on Accuracy rolls as the magisphere turns into a targeting scope, improving the caster's vision.
spells.summary: Accuracy +1

spells.name: Fake Memory
spells.description:
This spell implants the caster's memories into the target. The caster's perspective of the memory is their own, and the target will believe that the experiences and feelings of the caster are their own memories.

The content and duration of the implanted memories can be chosen from the caster's own memories.

If the target removes the memory with a [Remove Curse] or similar method, they will realize that the memories implanted in them are not their own. However, the memories will not be erased, and it is possible to recall them normally.
spells.summary: Implant false memories

spells.name: Conceal Self
spells.description:
The caster becomes invisible to all five senses, mechanical, and magical perceptions. They make no noise and give off no scent. The caster can still be touched, and their magic can be detected with [Mana Search] and similar spells.

If they make any movement other than a Limited Move or take any actions that require a check, the effect disappears.
spells.summary: Shrouds caster in mana, disappearing from enemy senses

spells.name: Nightwalker*
spells.description: The target gains the Darkvision ability. This allows them to see in darkness as if it was sunlight.
spells.summary: Enables the target to see in the dark

spells.name: Fairy Wish
spells.description:
One of the fairies contracted by the caster will appear and follow them around. The caster can speak with the fairy using Sylvan. However, the caster cannot give it an order or force it to do anything.

At any point during the spell's duration, the caster may ask the fairy for aid and receive a +1 bonus on a roll. The caster must decide to ask for the fairy's help before making the roll.

When the spell's duration expires, the caster asks the fairy for aid, or the spell is dispelled, the fairy returns to its home dimension.

The fairy flees to its home dimension (and this spell automatically canceled) if the caster enters combat. This spell may also not be cast during combat. Note that the spell ends before the Combat Preparation phase; Initiative checks and Monster Knowledge checks cannot gain bonus modifiers from this spell.
spells.summary: Caster requests Fairies, and they guide their decisions

spells.name: Violent Storm
spells.description: Roc's Spirit appears, flaps its wings, and creates a windstorm. Target takes 12 + Magic Power points of physical damage and falls prone.
spells.summary: Deals (12 + Magic Power) physical damage, targets fall prone

spells.name: Magic Reflection
spells.description:
A spell with "Target: 1 character" (including "1 entire character" or "1 character X") cast upon the sorcerer may be reflected back upon the spell's caster. The caster of [Magic Reflection] can wait to learn the result of the incoming Spellcasting check before declaring that they will use this effect. If it bounces back, the caster of the original spell must make a save themselves. If the spell is not reflected, the target may still attempt to resist the spell as normal. If the reflected spell's caster is one of the initial targets, the spell affects the caster only once.

After a spell is reflected with this effect, this spell ends.
spells.summary: Reflects magic spells to the caster

spells.name: Wizard Sign
spells.description: This spell leaves the caster's signature on the target, which can be a solid wall or floor. The signature will continue to glow faintly and will be visible to all. Characters who have mastered the Sorcerer or Conjurer classes will recognize that this spell created the signature. The signature is limited to the name of the wizard and a title whose uniqueness and legitimacy are guaranteed by Adventure Rank.
spells.summary: Leaves a caster sign

spells.name: Knocker Bomb
spells.description:
The spell creates a tiny magic bomb that blows up locks. The bomb explodes with a loud sound after 10 seconds (1 round), i.e., at the beginning of the caster's next turn, destroying the lock. Locks that are destroyed by this magic cannot be repaired.

Nonmagical locks will be destroyed without fail. If the caster attempts to destroy a lock closed by magic, make a contested roll versus the Magic Power of the locking spell.
spells.summary: Creates a bomb for blowing up locks

spells.name: Mana Camera
spells.description:
The magisphere transforms into a video recorder. Everything within the caster's sight is recorded as a video. The video recording capability depends upon the size of the magisphere used; small magispheres can hold up to 50 total minutes of video, medium magispheres 200 minutes, and large magispheres 1,000 minutes.

To replay recorded videos, this spell must be cast again on the same magisphere, which requires 3 minutes (18 rounds) to set up. When displaying video this way, it can be projected onto any surface without issue or watched directly on the magisphere.
spells.preparation_time: None to record, 3 minutes (18 rounds) to play back
spells.summary: Creates a machine to record video

spells.name: Earthquake
spells.description:
Deals a fixed 50 earth magic damage and causes every character in the target area that fails a Willpower check versus the caster's Spellcasting to fall prone. If a creature has multiple sections and not all of its sections are within the target area, it will not fall prone, regardless of the Willpower check.

While casting the spell, the caster must have both hands on the ground. They can remain in this pose and keep the earthquake going, dealing no additional damage, but causing anyone moving through the area to take a -2 penalty for all actions due to poor footing.

Evasion checks can be performed in the target area, but with a penalty of -4. If the caster changes stance, moves, falls prone, becomes affected by a [Distraction] spell (see p. 149), or takes any other action, the earthquake ends.

If the caster keeps the earthquake going for 10 minutes (60 rounds), all buildings and structures within the range will collapse.

This spell does not affect creatures who are not touching the ground.
spells.summary: Deals 50 damage and makes all in target area fall prone

spells.name: ⏩△Anti-Magic Barrier
spells.description:
Transforms the caster's skin into the tough hide of a Daemon, making it less susceptible to mana.

Whenever the Caster takes magical damage from a ranged attack or "Area: Shot" spell, the damage is reduced by 5 points.

This spell only takes effect once and is then lost.
spells.summary: Damage from ranged attacks and Area: Shot spells -5

spells.name: ‡Vice Weapon
spells.description: The target's melee and ranged attacks become magical and receive a +1 bonus to Accuracy and deal an additional +2 physical damage when attacking Undead or Humanoid characters.
spells.summary: Accuracy +1 and physical damage +2 against Undead and Humanoids

spells.name: ⏩Genocide Bullet
spells.description:
The bullet empowered by this spell has "Target: 1 area (6m Radius) / 20" and "Range: 2 (20m)" (regardless of the gun the caster uses). It deals Power 70 + Magic Power magic damage when it hits. Only a Gun with "Stance: 2H" can fire this spell (bullet).

The caster can exclude themselves from the target area even from within a skirmish. If the caster has learned the combat feat [Magic Control], they can exceptionally declare it when shooting with this bullet. This allows the caster to exclude any character within the shot's area of effect from the target.
spells.summary: Creates a bursting bullet with a Power 70 for 2H Gun only

spells.name: Flame Burst*
spells.description: Creates a large conflagration, dealing Power 30 + Magic Power magic damage.
spells.summary: Deals Power 30 damage

spells.name: Cure Blindness
spells.description:
Sight will be restored if the target has been blinded by a spell or unique skills. This requires a contested check.

This spell cannot restore sight due to physical defects or if the target is inherently blind.
spells.summary: Restores lost eyesight

spells.name: Overblow
spells.description:
For the duration of the spell, at the end of the caster's turn, the caster can deal Power 20 + Magic Power magical damage to any character within range and blast the target away from the caster.

Simplified Combat: This spell drives the target to the rearguard of the target's faction.

Standard or Advanced Combat: Drives the target 30 meters directly away from the caster. If the direction is uncertain, the caster should decide arbitrarily.

If the target is fixed to the ground, the target will receive +5 points of damage instead of being driven away if the Willpower check fails.
spells.summary: Creates a force field that blows the enemy away with Power 20

spells.name: Basic Healing
spells.description:
Directly restores the target's HP by (caster's Magic Power + 4) points.

Note: Fairy Magic of the Light type has no effect on Constructs, Magitech, or Undead.
spells.summary: Restore the target's HP by (Magic Power + 4) points

spells.name: Mitigate Fairy
spells.description:
This spell is only effective against fairy monsters. The affected fairy incurs a -2 penalty to all of its skill checks, and any physical or magical damage it causes is reduced by 2 points.

MP cost for this spell is equal to the monster's level. When multiple targets are selected simultaneously with the [Metamagic/Targets] combat feat, the MP cost is the sum of MP required for each target.
spells.summary: Weakens a Fairy

spells.name: Glue Bomb
spells.description:
This spell can only be cast on prone targets.

Whenever the target tries to stand up, the caster performs a Spellcasting check against the target's Fortitude save. If the Fortitude save is equal to or less than the Spellcasting check, the target remains prone. This save is considered a Minor Action on the target's part, but can only be attempted once per round.
spells.summary: Throws sticky substance that blocks movement

spells.name: Abyssal Storm
spells.description:
A storm of various phenomena arises from the Abyss.

This spell deals Power 50 + Magic Power magic damage to the targets.

The spell's type is determined by rolling a 1d after the Spellcasting Check, with the following results:

1: Lightning, 2: Energy, 3: Bludgeoning, 4: Slashing, 5: Poison, 6: Curse

 
Enhancement 1:

Roll the 1d twice when determining the type, and apply both results. For example, if the result is 1 or 3, the type of this spell will be Lightning and Bludgeoning.

If the two 1d results are the same, the spell will have only one type.

Enhancement 2:

The damage dealt increases to "Power 70 + Magic Power." This Enhancement Effect can only be used once per day.
spells.summary: Power 50 damage

spells.name: Crack
spells.description: Deals Power 40 + Magic Power magic damage and causes the target to fall prone. This spell has no effect if the target is in the sky or is otherwise not in contact with the ground.
spells.summary: Power 40 damage and makes fall prone

spells.name: Venom Espada
spells.description:
Poison particles wrap around the caster's body and impel the caster forward, harming all targets in their way.

This rushing attack deals Power 40 + Magic Power points of Poison magic damage.
spells.summary: Deals Power 40 damage

spells.name: Mother Cloak*
spells.description:
This spell envelops the target in a holy robe made of mana, providing protection.

The target's Defense increases by 5 points, and any applied magic damage is reduced by 5 points.

While under the spell's effects, the target cannot move or perform Major or Minor Actions.
spells.summary: Target cannot move or perform Major or Minor Actions, but has Defense +5 and Magic Damage -5

spells.name: Unchained Bomb
spells.description:
This spell creates a bomb which affects the trajectory of light in the area of effect, distorting visual information.

If a being within the target area has Five Senses or mechanical perception, they will lose the Combat Feat [Targeting] and all Combat Feats based on it. A character with magical perception is not affected by this spell.
spells.summary: Distorts visual perception

spells.name: Tornado
spells.description: The caster creates a tornado which barrels through the area, knocking prone anyone in its path, dealing Power 40 + Magic Power magic damage. If a monster has multiple sections which are not targeted, it will not fall prone.
spells.summary: Deals Power 40 damage and makes the target fall prone

spells.name: Multiple Actor/Crash Bear
spells.description:
The target can make one additional Major Action in its turn. If the target is a character with multiple sections, only one of the selected sections is affected by this effect.

The effect of this spell disappears automatically when the target's turn comes to an end.

The MP cast of this spell is 10 + the target's level (adventurer level or monster level). When MP is reduced by [MP Save] or similar abilities, the value calculated by this formula is considered the basic MP cost, and points are deducted from it.

This is a "Symbolic Lore" spell (see Monstrous Lore p. 17).
spells.summary: Target can take two Major Actions per turn

spells.name: Earth Heal II
spells.description: Heals Power 30 + Magic Power HP. Undead, Magitech beings, and Constructs can be healed by this spell.
spells.summary: Heals Power 30

spells.name: Sacred Jail*
spells.description:
This spell has no effect unless the target is a Daemon.

A chain of pure mana entangles the target. The target will be unable to move by any special means, spells, abilities, or effects.

This spell's duration cannot be extended by [Metamagic/Time] (even with [Universal Metamagic]). A character which resists this spell will be immune to this spell for the next day cast by the same caster.

This spell can be cast as “Resistance: Can't” by consuming 6 MP, though only once per day per target.
spells.summary: Block a Daemon's movement and use of spells

spells.name: Great Capture
spells.description:
This spell chains the target to the ground with countless earthen arms. For the spell's duration, the target's movement becomes 0 and it will not be able to make any Major Action except to escape, as described below. In addition, for the spell's duration, the target fails all Evasion checks automatically. Target will be forced to the ground and will lose the ability to use [〇Sword's Grace/Wings Of The Wind] and [〇Flying].

The target can try to escape using a Major Action. It must make a contested Fortitude, Willpower, or (Adventurer Level + Strength modifier) check (target's choice) versus the caster's Spellcasting. On a success, the spell ends.
spells.summary: Chains target to the ground with countless earthen arms

spells.name: Infinity Circle
spells.description:
Extracts mana from a small-scale Shallow Abyss and uses it to strengthen one's own magic.

When a caster within the area of effect uses Abyssal Magic with "Duration: Instant," the MP cost is reduced by half (rounded up).

Furthermore, if the Abyssal Magic spell used is one that refers to the Power Table, the Power is treated as being 20 higher (maximum 100).

When using Enhancement Materials, it is necessary to consume them as normal.

Enhancement 1:

The spell's "Target" becomes "All Areas (Radius 30m) / Space."

Enhancement 2:

The MP Cost of this spell is changed to "50," allowing this spell to be used as a Minor Action or during Combat Preparation.
spells.summary: Reduces the cost of Abyssal Magic and creates a space that strengthens its effects

spells.name: ⏩Accurate Hits*
spells.description:
The caster is able to feed on the results of eliminating their enemies.

If the caster makes an Accuracy check against an enemy character with a Melee Attack or Ranged Attack and succeeds, they can add a +2 bonus to the Success Value of their Evasion check for the duration of the effect.

This effect can only be used once, but the caster can select which Evasion check to apply it to.
spells.summary: Evasion check +2 after successful Accuracy check against enemy

spells.name: Search Abyss
spells.description:
If there are any Shallow Abysses within range, you know their exact location.

This spell does not reveal the size or threat level of a Shallow Abyss.

Enhancement:

You can check the threat level of the Shallow Abyss you have detected using (Abyss Gazer Level + Intelligence Modifier) as the standard value. You also receive a +2 to the success value.
spells.summary: Detect the location of Shallow Abysses within range

spells.name: Shield Circle
spells.description:
Creates a magic circle around the target's feet, causing them to lose consciousness. The magic circle will spread to a radius of 3 meters around the target's feet.

The target will remain unconscious at the circle's center with 0 HP and be treated as if no time elapses for them.

No harm can be done to the enclosed target from a distance, and its HP and MP will not be reduced by spells or effects with range.

This magic circle can be easily dispelled by others touching it, at which point the effect of this magic is lost. After the spell ends, the target will remain unconscious with 0 HP.

This spell requires 1 hour to cast.
spells.summary: Seals the target in a magic circle

spells.name: ‡Vice Field
spells.description:
A barrier forms around the target area, preventing any Humanoids or Undead from passing through. This barrier prevents any spells or abilities from Humanoids or Undead from passing through as well.

When this spell is cast, the barrier will not form if any Humanoids or Undead are already within the area of this spell. Additionally, if this effect overlaps with the range of a [Sacred Field] spell, both spells' effects end immediately.
spells.summary: Creates a barrier blocking Humanoids and Undead

spells.name: Become Dragon
spells.description:
The caster is transformed into a Draconet (see CR III, p. 396, or ML) and uses its data. If the caster's HP is below their maximum, that damage will be carried over to the Draconet's Body section. Similarly, any damage taken by the Draconet's Body section is passed back to the caster when this spell is released.

The caster's own class, combat feats, and racial abilities are all lost for the duration of the effect, and any weapons, armor, or accessories the caster was equipped with are temporarily lost and cannot be used. Items carried by the caster may only be used for effects that do not have a defined Stance.

If the caster wishes, their Draconet form can act as a mount for another PC. In this case, use the Draconet's standard mount data (CR III, p. 259, or ET, p. 174). The jockey's adventurer-level enhancements and stunt effects can be applied as usual for a mount, and mount equipment can be equipped. The caster's own actions are limited to those of the mount.

A caster of sorcerer class level 15 can use this spell to shapeshift into a Lesser Dragon (CR II, p. 396, or [as a mount] CR III, p. 260 or ET, p. 175) instead. A Lesser Dragon's spells and unique mount-specific technique skills cannot be used while under this spell. The Lesser Dragon's Head section will carry the caster's HP reduction instead of its Body.
spells.summary: Transform into a Draconet

spells.name: Mist Hide
spells.description: A fog covers the target, making it difficult to see. The target gets a +2 bonus to all Evasion checks.
spells.summary: Covers the target in a haze, Evasion +2

spells.name: Bad Vibes
spells.description: A character who steps into the area of effect will feel an unpleasant atmosphere. There is no further effect.
spells.summary: Creates an unpleasant vibe

spells.name: Death Ray
spells.description: A ray of baleful light deals Power 70 + Magic Power magical damage. If this spell reduces the target's HP to 0, the target takes a -20 penalty modifier to its immediate Death Check.
spells.summary: Deals Power 70 damage

spells.name: Holography
spells.description:
The magisphere transforms into a holographic recorder/player. Everything within line of sight of the caster is recorded as a three-dimensional hologram. The magisphere can retain up to 1 hour of holographic content.

To show any recorded holograms, this spell must be cast again on the same magisphere. While displaying in this way, the caster can freely change the hologram's size and scope (for instance, displaying a room-sized scene on a tabletop, or displaying only a single character instead of the entire scene). Holograms are clear and detailed, but also translucent, flickery, and obviously "not here."

The spell can also be used to trim, edit, and rearrange parts of the recording.
spells.summary: Captures motion video and plays back 3D holograms

spells.name: ⏩△Wave Riding*
spells.description:
Redirects water currents received throughout the body and speeds up reflexes while underwater.

The target gains a +1 bonus to Evasion checks when underwater.
spells.summary: Evasion checks +1 underwater

spells.name: Shock Bomb
spells.description: Caster creates a sphere of energy which paralyzes the target on impact. The target's Agility is reduced by 12 points (but not below 0). This will reduce the target's movement, Evasion, Initiative, etc. For fixed-value characters, movement speed is reduced by 12, Initiative is reduced by 2, and Evasion is reduced by 2. Other unique skills may be modified at the GM's discretion.
spells.summary: Agility -12 to target

spells.name: Spirit Knife
spells.description:
Deal Power 0 + Magic Power Psychic magic damage to the target.

 
Enhancement 1:

The type becomes "Psychic + Curse," and the damage dealt becomes "Power 20 + Magic Power."

Enhancement 2:

The spell changes to "Target: 1 area (radius 3m) / 5".
spells.summary: Power 0 Damage

spells.name: Invisible Storage
spells.description:
Create a pocket Shallow Abyss and store an object there.

The object stored will be treated as if no time has passed. The stored object will disappear from the spot and can be retrieved wherever the caster is when this spell is cast again. If the caster dies, the stored object will immediately reappear at their place of death.

Only one object may be stored per caster unless an enhanced effect is used (see below). The caster can only either store or retrieve one object per use of this spell.

The stored object must be small enough to fit into a 1m cube. Living creatures cannot be stored with this spell.

Enhancement 1:

If this spell is cast while already storing an object, the caster can store one additional object. As long as this enhancement effect is used with each casting, the maximum number of objects that can be stored is equal to the caster's Abyss Gazer class level. If the caster dies, all stored objects reappear at their location.

While this enhancement effect does not need to be applied to retrieve objects, when multiple objects are stored, only one object of your choice can be retrieved at a time.

Enhancement 2:

By using this spell as a Minor Action, you can store or retrieve an object in an instant. Only one object can be retrieved using a spell when this Enhancement Effect is applied.
spells.summary: Store objects in a personal Shallow Abyss

spells.name: Refresh Image
spells.description:
The target's HP is restored by Power 20 + Magic Power. At the same time, the success value is compared with the success value of any one ongoing Psychic and/or Curse effects the target is subjected to, and if the result is higher, the effect is dispelled.

Undead, Construct, and Magitech characters are also eligible for this effect.

 
Enhancement 1:

This spell can be used with a Minor Action and during Combat Preparation. The Spellcasting Check is omitted, and the success value is treated as 0. You may only use this spell as a Minor Action once per round on the same target.

After casting this spell with a Minor Action, it is possible to cast it again with a Major Action. In this case, the target can be the same.

Enhancement 2:

The power of this spell is changed to "Power 40 + Magic Power." The accompanying effects are still applied.
spells.summary: Heals the target with Power 20

spells.name: ⏩△Deficiency
spells.description: The target gains a Weak Point (see CR I, p. 66) to "Poison, Disease, Curse Damage +3," and the weakness automatically applies to it. This spell can only be used once per round.
spells.summary: Target gains a weak point

spells.name: Fake Gamel*
spells.description:
This spell can create silver or gold coins that are indistinguishable from real ones.

The amount of money the caster can create is equal to this spell's Success Value x 1000 gamels.

Gamels created by this spell cannot be detected by ordinary means. Even if they are found, the Success Value of this spell must be compared to the Success Value of a Detect check in order to identify them.

Silver and gold gamel coins created by this spell will disappear when the duration elapses. This spell can only be cast once per day and takes 1 hour to cast.
spells.summary: Creates fake gamel coins

spells.name: Dark Mist
spells.description: Creatures that fail to resist lose their sense of distance due to magical fog, taking a -2 penalty to their Evasion checks.
spells.summary: Evasion checks -2

spells.name: Bad Steam
spells.description:
The target is bombarded with unpleasant vapors from the Spirit of the Steam Pod. This results in a -1 penalty to Accuracy and Evasion checks.

If the target is a monster character whose habitat is forests, swamps, or caves, it is immune to this effect.
spells.summary: -1 to Accuracy and Evasion of target

spells.name: Unlock
spells.description:
This spell opens mundane locks. If the lock was sealed magically, make a contested roll against the seal's caster. The lock opens if this spell's caster wins.

The mechanical part of the lock remains working after casting this spell.
spells.summary: Uses mana to open a lock

spells.name: ⏩Phantom Flood*
spells.description:
Water, collected by magic, is unleashed as a muddy stream.

This spell randomly targets two characters (sections) within the area and deals Power 50 + Magic Power magic damage to them, knocking them prone. The effect will not double up on a single target; this spell always selects two separate characters or sections.

If a character has multiple sections, they will not fall prone by this effect unless all of their sections become targets.

After the first round (which is immediate), for as long as this spell is active, choose two new targets after the caster completes their turn. These new targets are affected by this spell as soon as they are selected.

Please note that the effect of this spell extends to the caster as well, and the caster cannot remove themselves from selection.
spells.summary: Deals Power 50 damage, causes targets to fall prone

spells.name: Shoot Arrow
spells.description:
Imbues an arrow or quarrel with magical power and fires it. Treat the effect as if the projectile were fired from a bow or crossbow with Power 20 and Critical Threshold 10. The projectile hits automatically and deals Power 20 + Magic Power physical damage.

To use this spell, the caster must be holding an arrow or heavy arrow, which is consumed by the spell. A bullet or sling stone cannot be used.

If the projectile used for this spell is special, apply its effects as well.

If several arrows and quarrels are stored in an Arrow Case or other storage device equipped by the caster, the combat feat [Metamagic/Targets] allows this spell to be used on multiple targets simultaneously.
spells.summary: Imbues an arrow with magical power and fires it for Power 20 physical damage

spells.name: ⏩Retreat*
spells.description:
This spell blesses any retreat. Retreating from a skirmish does not incur a -4 penalty to Evasion checks, and instead gains a +2 bonus to Evasion, Fortitude, and Willpower checks. The target(s) of this spell may be chosen at the caster's discretion.

The duration of this spell cannot be extended by [Metamagic/Time].
spells.summary: No Evasion penalty when declaring retreat; Evasion, Fortitude, Willpower +2

spells.name: Cyclone*
spells.description: This spell creates a violent storm with lightning, dealing Power 40 + Magic Power magic damage to the targets.
spells.summary: Deals Power 40 damage
spells.divinity: Furusil, Goddess of Wind and Rain

spells.name: Recall Soul
spells.description:
Summon the souls of past characters who died within a Shallow Abyss or similar environment and anchor them to a space. The character will continue to exist as a Ghost in this space, retaining their memories, knowledge, and experience from their previous life. They will be able to move around within the environment, but if they leave the Shallow or a similar environment, or if the Shallow they have been summoned into disappears, they will immediately disappear along with their soul.

In order to use this spell, the caster must be in contact with a part of the target's corpse or with an item that belonged to the target in life.

This spell requires one hour to cast.

This effect does not work on characters who die outside of the Shallow. In addition, this spell does not work if the target has been reincarnated. As a result, the caster can tell if the target has died outside of the Shallow or has already been reincarnated.

Enhancement:

Change "Resistance" to "Negates" and compare the success value with the target to forcibly summon the soul.
spells.summary: Summon the souls of the dead within a Shallow Abyss

spells.name: Nursing
spells.description:
The spell slows down the effects of any Poison- or Disease-type effects the target is currently experiencing. No contested check is needed.

If the poison or disease progresses over time, its duration will be tripled. The period will slow by three times if the poison or disease deals damage over time. Other effects will appear each third time it should affect the target.

However, the duration of adverse effects will also be tripled, and the recovery period from such effects will be tripled as well.

Even if the progression occurs over 8 hours or more, the triple interval can be maintained by reapplying this spell every day.

This spell has no effect on poisons or diseases with "Duration: Instant."

Note: Fairy Magic of the Light type has no effect on Constructs, Magitech, or Undead.
spells.summary: Suppresses the spread of poison and disease

spells.name: Field Protection II
spells.description:
This spell creates a circle of protection and gives a defensive blessing to whatever is there.

The targets take -2 damage from all physical and magical sources. This effect does not reduce damage of Poison, Disease, or Curse type.
spells.summary: Reduce damage to the target by 2 points

spells.name: Flight
spells.description:
The target can fly at will. Flying via this spell does not allow complex maneuvers. The target can only perform actions that they could normally make during a Full Move. Even if the target's movement is blocked by a skirmish or other obstacle, they can pass straight through them with a -4 penalty to Evasion checks.

The target's speed while flying due to this spell is 50. Therefore, with a Full Move, the player can move up to 150 meters in 10 seconds (1 round).
spells.summary: Target will be able to fly

spells.name: Revelation
spells.description:
This spell brands willing targets with the same holy symbol of the deity the caster follows. The target can also gain their first level as a Priest by paying 1,000 Experience at this time. The god they follow will be the same as the caster. This spell cannot allow a Priest to advance beyond the first level and does not affect Tabbit or Runefolk characters.

This spell takes one hour to cast.
spells.summary: Performs a holy ceremony, marking followers

spells.name: Purification
spells.description: Up to 100 liters of water touched by the caster becomes pure. Liquid, poisonous substances, and drugs can also be purified, in which case a contested check is needed.
spells.summary: Purges water of impurities and solutes, making it pure and clean

spells.name: Barrier Circle
spells.description:
The character temporarily gains the vigilance of a Daemon.

For the duration of the effect, the caster detects the presence of any character that enters the range of the spell. Detectable characters must be larger than small animals.

This spell can also detect when a character leaves the range. Any target that enters or leaves the spell area will detect the presence of this spell, but not the caster's location.
spells.summary: Detects the presence of intruders in an area

spells.name: Cure Stone
spells.description: Returns a petrified target to its former state. Alternatively, it completely removes petrifaction. The effect will not work on natural stones or fossils.
spells.summary: Removes petrification

spells.name: Petrovenom
spells.description: Petroviper's Spirit bites the target and injects petrifaction poison. Target receives the Petrifaction effect (Dexterity or Agility/-6). This effect is Poison-type and lasts for 3 minutes.
spells.summary: Petrifaction (Dexterity or Agility / -6)

spells.name: Mind Blank
spells.description:
The target can no longer perceive the caster and must choose to act as if the caster is not there. If the target is on guard, it will let the caster pass, and in combat, the target can't attack the caster with a direct attack or target them with spells with "Target: 1 Character" (including Entire Character and Character X). Note that a target cannot use [Magic Control] on the caster since it cannot see it. The caster cannot be blocked by the target, and if the caster is in one-on-one melee with the target, the caster can leave without having to prepare to retreat.

Any aggressive actions from the caster towards the target (touch, attack, targeting with the spell, etc.) will end the spell just before the action is resolved.
spells.summary: Make the target unable to see the caster

spells.name: Fire Wall
spells.description:
Summons a wall of fire 50cm thick, 3m high, and 10m long. The wall completely blocks the line of sight but does not prevent the passage of creatures, objects, and spells. The wall must be built vertically, directly from the ground, and cannot pass through a space already occupied by an object or creature.

A character attempting to pass through this wall must make a Willpower check. If the check fails, the character cannot pass through and ends its movement at the previous area (Simplified Combat) or at the last 1-meter coordinates (Standard Combat). The character then suffers Power 20 + Magic Power fire magic damage.

If the Willpower check succeeds, the player passes through the wall and takes half damage.

A character forced to pass through this wall also needs to make the Willpower check. In this case, the check's success or failure only affects whether or not the damage is halved, and the character will still pass through the wall even if the check fails.

See the "Note on Spells That Create Walls," Magus Arts page 76.
spells.summary: Put up a wall of fire

spells.name: Drain Touch
spells.description: Deals Power 10 + Magic Power magical damage and the caster heals HP equal to the applied damage dealt. The HP recovery effect occurs even if the target succeeds in resisting.
spells.summary: Drains Power 10 from the target

spells.name: Sneak
spells.description:
The target is shrouded by mystical mist. They cannot be seen by magical or mechanical means of perception or magical traps that rely on magical sight for the duration of the spell. Characters using Five Senses as means of perception can see the character normally.

If the character takes a Full Move, attacks, uses magic on another target, or any other action that interacts with another character, this effect ends immediately.
spells.summary: Shrouds target in mist, hiding it from magical and mechanical perception

spells.name: Bless
spells.description:
The target receives a +6 bonus to their Dexterity, Agility, Strength, or Vitality score, resulting in a +1 bonus to their modifier. This increase can raise base stats and maximum HP. For fixed-value characters and mounts, Bless can increase Accuracy by +1 for Dexterity, Evasion and Movement Speed for Agility, and Fortitude and HP for Vitality. The GM decides if this affects any unique skills.

The caster may use Bless on the same target again to raise a different score, but not the same one. If the caster uses the Combat Feat [Metamagic/Targets] with this spell, it can be cast on multiple targets simultaneously. In this case, the ability score to be increased must be the same for all targets.
spells.summary: +6 to Dexterity, Agility, Strength, or Vitality

spells.name: Counter Daemon*
spells.description: Imparts the ability to resist abilities used by Daemons. The target gains a +2 bonus to any Fortitude or Willpower checks against unique skills used by Daemons.
spells.summary: Fortitude and Willpower +2 against Daemons

spells.name: Awaken
spells.description:
A sleeping, stunned or unconscious character wakes up. If their HP is below 0, it is set to 1. If sleep is a spell or unique skill effect, then the caster needs to make a contested roll against the success value of the effect.

The affected character can take action immediately. Prone characters wake up still prone.
spells.summary: Wakes a target up from being asleep or unconscious

spells.name: Holy Tree*
spells.description:
Caster transforms themself into a sacred giant tree. The caster can, in principle, keep all their abilities as a character. Weapons and items can be used (using moving branches). Speech is not restricted. With this in mind, the following changes will be made to the caster's abilities and actions.

Caster's perception becomes magical.

The caster's feet (roots) are fixed to the ground, and movement is set to 0. The caster can no longer use a Kick or any weapon that enhances it, and Evasion checks will be made with a -4 penalty.

The caster cannot change position (area, coordinate) by any effect, including the [Teleport] spell, and cannot be forced to do so. They cannot fly, mount, or be mounted. They are always on the ground, cannot be knocked prone, and cannot be a target of Throw.

The caster can make melee attacks or use effects within Range: Touch with Range/Area: 1 (10m) / Target ([Metamagic/Targets] and [Metamagic/Distance] are not effective). When the caster declares [Cover], the target must be within the same range of 1 (10m) (of course, the caster does not move in the place, but the target will be protected by the branches).
spells.summary: Acts as a holy tree

spells.name: Cure Wounds
spells.description: Heals Power 10 + Magic Power damage. This spell does not affect Constructs or Magitech. If the target is Undead, this spell deals Power 10 + Magic Power damage instead.
spells.summary: Heal target's wounds with Power 10

spells.name: Regeneration
spells.description:
Regenerates body parts that have been lost due to mishaps, accidents, etc.

Though casting this spell is instantaneous, the regeneration takes some time to complete. The amount of time depends on how much of the body the caster wishes to regenerate: a week for an amount approximately equal to a finger, two weeks for a hand or similar amount, and up to a month for flesh equaling a complete limb. To regenerate multiple areas, the caster will need to cast this spell several times.

This spell does not affect dead characters.
spells.summary: Regenerate missing body parts

spells.name: Astral Burn
spells.description:
Sends Daemonic thoughts as a mass of mana to attack the target. The target suffers Power 10 + Magic Power magic damage.

For every 5 meters' distance away from the target, this damage increases by 1 point (+1 for 5-9 meters, +2 for 10-14 meters, etc. up to +6).
spells.summary: Power 10 + Magic Power damage, increasing by distance

spells.name: Exhaustive Sucking
spells.description:
The Spirit of Swamp Worm appears and envelops the caster before biting the target, allowing the caster to recover HP from the sucked blood.

If the target fails its resistance check, it will take 18 + Magic Power points of physical damage, and the caster will recover HP equal to the amount of damage dealt.

If the target has [◯Poison Immunity], it will still take damage, but the caster's HP will not be restored.

It is not possible to increase the number of targets of this spell with [Metamagic/Targets].
spells.summary: Converts (18 + Magic Power) points of physical damage to HP

spells.name: Enchant Weapon
spells.description: The target's weapon becomes infused with mana. When the target makes a melee or ranged attack, the weapon used in the attack is treated as a magic weapon (which still does physical damage), and the damage it causes is increased by +1.
spells.summary: Physical damage +1

spells.name: Search Daemon
spells.description:
If there is a Daemon character, Gate Imp, Imp Seal, or Abyss Gate within the area of effect, the caster will know of its presence. The location or the number is unknown.

Gate Imps, Imp Seals, Abyss Gates, and Daemons summoned by the caster are not covered by this spell.

Other Warlocks within the area of this spell and/or the possessor of a detected Imp Seal will sense that this spell has been used. However, the specific location of the caster will remain unknown.
spells.summary: Can sense the presence of Daemons

spells.name: Life Insurance*
spells.description:
When the caster is in a life-threatening situation, gamel will restore their life.

For the duration of the effect, if the caster performs a Death Check, they can gain a bonus to the check by spending gamel before the check.

The bonus is +1 for every 100 gamels spent, and there is no upper limit to the bonus obtained by this effect. However, the consumed gamel is lost regardless of the success or failure of the check.

This consumed gamel increases by 100 for every time this spell has been invoked by the caster in the past. For example, the second time the caster gains a +1 bonus costs 200 gamel, and the tenth time costs 1,000 gamel.

This increase in gamel is permanently cumulative until the caster fails a Death Check. It is thus important to keep track of the number of times the effect is used.
spells.summary: Spend gamel to get a bonus to Death Check

spells.name: ⏩△Big Defender/Dinos
spells.description:
Dinos' Spirit protects the target, who gains a +4 bonus to Evasion checks against melee attacks.

This is a "Symbolic Lore" spell (see Monstrous Lore p. 17).
spells.summary: Evasion +4 against Melee Attacks

spells.name: Bless II
spells.description: Increases all of the target's ability scores by +6, resulting in a +1 bonus to all of their modifiers. This will also increase derived ability scores, such as Maximum HP and MP. For fixed-value characters, increase their Accuracy, Evasion, Fortitude, and Willpower by +1 and Maximum HP, Movement Speed, and MP by +6. The GM decides if this increase affects any unique skills.
spells.summary: Increase all of the target's ability scores by +6

spells.name: Spark
spells.description: Generates tiny bolts of lightning in the area, dealing Power 0 + Magic Power of magical damage.
spells.summary: Deals Power 0 damage

spells.name: Shatter Symbol*
spells.description:
Destroys the caster's holy symbol to recover HP.

Restores 30 HP to characters in the target area. This spell does not affect Undead, Magitech, or Constructs.

The holy symbol spent for this spell cannot be repaired, and the caster cannot use Divine Magic for 1d days afterward, even if a new holy symbol is acquired.
spells.summary: Destroy holy symbol to recover 30 HP

spells.name: Freezing Breath
spells.description: Dino's Spirit blows cold air on the target, dealing Power 20 + Magic Power magic damage.
spells.summary: Deals Power 20

spells.name: ⏩Shower of Healing Bullets
spells.description:
This spell creates a healing bullet that bursts in midair and rains down over a wide area. The bullet has "Target: 1 area (6m radius)/20”, and if it hits, heals Power 30 + Magic Power HP. This spell does not crit.

The bullet can only be fired by a Gun with "Stance: 2H" and will hit the target unless the Accuracy check fails automatically. The caster can select any number of target characters (up to 20) to fire at within the area of effect.

This spell does not affect Undead, Magitech, or Construct characters.
spells.summary: Creates a healing bullet with Power 30 that rains down over a wide area, 2H Gun only

spells.name: Ice Storm
spells.description: Creates a violent blizzard in the area of effect, dealing Power 30 + Magic Power magic damage.
spells.summary: Deals Power 30 damage

spells.name: Sound Recorder
spells.description:
The magisphere transforms into a voice recorder and reproducer. It can record a voice heard by a caster at the same volume. The total recording capacity of a magisphere depends on its size, with a small magisphere being able to record up to 10 minutes, a medium magisphere up to 1 hour, and a large magisphere up to 1 day.

The caster must cast this spell again to playback audio. The recorded voice will be played back at the recorded volume. During playback, the caster can select any part of the audio to be played back.

The spell can also be used to delete parts of the recording and edit audio.

This spell cannot reproduce magic-like effects such as Spellsongs.
spells.summary: Record and playback audio

spells.name: Slash Image
spells.description:
The target takes Power 40+ Magic Power magic damage.

 
Enhancement 1:

The range becomes "2 (50m) / Target" and the damage dealt becomes "Power 60 + Magic Power."

Enhancement 2:

Even if the caster declares both [Metamagic/Accuracy] and [Metamagic/Power Assurance], they will not have to double the MP cost. The same applies if they declare both using [Universal Metamagic].
spells.summary: Power 40 damage

spells.name: Confusion*
spells.description:
If the target is performing a check which takes more than 1 minute (6 rounds), it will be canceled.

Also, if the target has learned the combat feat [Targeting] or has a similar ability, the caster can make it lose its effect. In this case, the combat feat or ability on which it is based also loses its effect.
spells.summary: Distorts the target's eyesight

spells.name: Sleep Cloud
spells.description:
Characters in the target area who succumb to this spell fall prone asleep.

The target automatically wakes up after the duration ends. A character that does not fall asleep will not be affected. A character with multiple sections will not be affected unless all the sections are targeted at the same time.
spells.summary: Puts the target to sleep

spells.name: Treat Pain*
spells.description:
Reduces pain from unwanted effects.

If the target is damaged by Poison-, Disease-, or Curse-type damage while this spell is in effect, the damage is reduced by 5 points.
spells.summary: -5 Poison-, Disease-, and Curse-type damage
spells.divinity: Miritsa, Goddess of Love and Vengeance

spells.name: Weakness
spells.description:
Adds a random weak point to the target, as determined by the following table. The effect is applied regardless of previous results of any Monster Knowledge checks, and is not doubled by [Weakness Exploit]. This spell can be cast repeatedly on the same target (though only once per turn per caster), which can create multiple overlapping weaknesses. Weakness are also cumulative if the same roll occurs on several casts.

The target still retains its immunities, and attempting to add a weak point for an immune damage type will fail automatically.

Weak Points Table
spells.power_table:
1d Weak Point
1 Fire Damage +3
2 Water/Ice Damage +3
3 Lightning Damage +3
4 Physical Damage +2
5 Magic Damage +2
6 Accuracy +1 vs. this target
spells.summary: Adds a weak point

spells.name: Field Protection
spells.description:
Creates a circle of protection which grants a blessing to the target.

The targets take -1 physical and magical damage. Protection does not affect Poison-, Disease-, or Curse-types.
spells.summary: Reduces the target's received damage by -1

spells.name: Minor Illusion
spells.description: This spell produces small-scale visual illusions in close proximity to the caster. Examples include flowers appearing in the palm of the caster's hand, fireworks exploding from the top of the head, or small particles of light surrounding the entire body. These illusions are obviously not real objects, and cannot provide illumination, distraction, or other significant effects. Illusions created by this spell are visual only.
spells.summary: Creates a small illusion

spells.name: Spell Enhance
spells.description: Activates the innate magic abilities of the target. The target receives a +1 bonus to their Magic Power.
spells.summary: Magic Power +1

spells.name: Petri-Cloud
spells.description:
Those who fail to resist this spell will permanently turn to stone after 1 minute (6 rounds). If the caster is reduced to 0 HP or lower or spells such as [Remove Curse] are successfully cast on a target before this happens, the spell ends without effect.

To restore petrified characters, a [Cure Stone] spell must be successfully cast.
spells.summary: Turns victims into stone

spells.name: ‡Fear
spells.description: For each Undead or Humanoid in the area that fails to resist, roll 2d6 and consult the "Banish/Fear Table" below to determine Fear's effect. This spell is Psychic type if the target is a Humanoid.
spells.power_table:
2d Effect
2-4 The target panics and goes berserk. For 30 seconds (3 rounds), it receives a +2 bonus for Accuracy and a -2 penalty for Evasion. If the target has an Intelligence score, it cannot use any actions that require reason or cast any spells.
5-9 The target is consumed by fear, slowing its movements. For 3 minutes (18 rounds), it receives a -1 penalty on all Accuracy, Evasion, and Spellcasting checks.
10-12 The target flees (or, in the case of a skirmish, uses a retreat action). If it cannot flee, it cowers in fear, cannot take any actions for ten seconds (1 round), and automatically fails all action checks. After one round, it can act normally again.
spells.summary: Negatively affects Undead and Humanoids

spells.name: ⏩Signal Bullet
spells.description:
This spell creates a signal bullet that shines intensely when it hits a target. The light emitted by the signal bullet illuminates a space of 2-3 areas (10m radius) for 10 seconds (1 round). If the target is not hit, the signal bullet hits the ground near the target and emits light. It is also possible to fire at a location (area, coordinate), which illuminates the area and the adjacent area (Simplified Combat) or within a 10m radius from the coordinate (Standard Combat, Advanced Combat). It is also possible to fire without a target, in which case it will fire after hitting an obstacle or a barrier or flying to the full range.

If a character with five senses or mechanical perception is hit by this bullet, they are blinded by intense light for 10 seconds (1 round) and receive a -2 penalty for action checks (see CR I, p. 114). Characters with magic perception are not affected.

This bullet will not cause damage to the target it hits.
spells.summary: Make a signal bullet

spells.name: ⏩△Fossil Absorber
spells.description: Fossil Chrysalis's Spirit protects the target, which takes 6 points less of any magic damage it suffers.
spells.summary: Magic damage -6

spells.name: Vital Force
spells.description:
Brings the target back from the brink of death. If the target's HP is less than 0, it will be healed to 0.

Note: Fairy Magic of the Light type has no effect on Constructs, Magitech, or Undead.
spells.summary: Brings the target back from the brink of death

spells.name: Daemon's Flight
spells.description: The caster can fly with Movement 20 for the duration of the spell. While flying, the user gains a +1 to Accuracy Checks for melee attacks. This bonus modifier does not overlap or accumulate with the equivalent effects of "Sword's Grace/Wings Of The Wind," such as [〇Flight].
spells.summary: Fly with 20 movement. Melee Accuracy and Evasion +1

spells.name: ⏩△Hyper Acceleration*
spells.description:
The Divine Hand itself descends, accelerating all movement.

All characters within the area have their Dexterity and Agility increased by 12 points during the spell duration. Movement and other parameters which are based on those attributes or their Modifiers will also change.
spells.summary: Dexterity +12, Agility +12

spells.name: Steal Mind
spells.description: Deals Power 10 + Magic Power damage to the target's MP and restores the caster's MP equal to the damage dealt, up to a maximum of 1/10th the target's total MP (rounded up).
spells.summary: Steals MP from target

spells.name: △Take the Lead I
spells.description:
Sensing the hostility of enemies in the Shallow, prepare for battle.

The caster gains +1 to Initiative Checks in a Shallow Abyss.

Enhancement:

Change the Spell to "Target: 1 Entire Character" and "Range/Area: 1 (10m) / Target."
spells.summary: +1 to Initiative Check in a Shallow Abyss

spells.name: Miasma Grenade
spells.description:
Materializes the image of an explosion.

Deals Power 20 + Magic Power Poison magic damage to the targets.

 
Enhancement:

Change the spell to "Cost: MP12," the Type becomes "Fire and Poison," and the damage dealt is "Power 40 + Magic Power."
spells.summary: Power 20 Damage

spells.name: ⏩Shotgun Bullet
spells.description:
Bullet deals damage to "Target: 1 area (3m Radius)/5" and "Range: 1(10m)." It deals Power 20 + Magic Power magic damage to every target it hits. Only a gun with "Stance: 2H" can fire this bullet.

The caster may include an entire skirmish, including themselves, in the area of effect of the shot, but exclude themselves from the target. Also, if the caster has acquired the combat feat [Magic Control], they can exceptionally declare it when shooting with this bullet. This will allow them to exclude any character(s) of the caster's choice from the area of effect of the shot.
spells.summary: Infuses a bullet with Power 20 and area effect; 2H gun only

spells.name: Whisper Heal
spells.description:
Restores the HP of characters in the target area by (caster's Magic Power) points.

Note: Fairy Magic of the Light type has no effect on Constructs, Magitech, or Undead.
spells.summary: Restore the target's HP by (Magic Power) points

spells.name: Soul Sacrifice
spells.description:
The caster transforms into a Doppelganger while maintaining all of their abilities; the caster chooses at the time of casting whether to use the Doppelganger's stats or their own (these cannot be changed in later rounds).

This spell cannot be canceled at will, and the character will be treated as a Daemon character from this point on. The Target Number is 40 when using [Perfect Cancellation].

A person who becomes a Doppelganger by this spell becomes a Daemon physically and mentally and will be treated as an NPC from now on.
spells.summary: Become a Doppelganger

spells.name: Avenger
spells.description:
Curses oneself and gives the target the same curse.

The Caster takes 5 points of fixed damage, and the target takes Power 20 + Magic Power curse magic damage. If the number of targets is increased by [Metamagic/Targets], the damage taken by the caster is not multiplied.
spells.summary: Damage to the caster and target

spells.name: Abyssal Vortex
spells.description:
The caster releases a vortex of abyssal magic from their hand, shooting it forward.

The target is dealt magic damage equal to Power 30 + Magic Power.

The spell's type is determined by rolling 1d after the Spellcasting Check, and the result is as follows:

1: Lightning, 2: Energy, 3: Bludgeoning, 4: Slashing, 5: Poison, 6: Curse

 
Enhancement:

Roll the 1d twice when determining the type, and apply both results. For example, if the result is 1 or 3, the type of this spell will be Lightning and Bludgeoning.

If the two 1d results are the same, the spell will have only one type.
spells.summary: Power 30 damage

spells.name: Summon Fairy VII
spells.description: This spell is identical to [Summon Fairy], except the monster level of the fairy to be called is 15.
spells.summary: Calls and uses a level 15 Fairy

spells.name: Dark Soul
spells.description:
Borrows an unconscious body and manipulates it temporarily.

If the target character is unconscious, asleep, etc., the caster can move them at will; if their HP is below 0 when this spell is cast on them, their HP is set to 1.

The target takes their turn immediately after this spell is cast. At this time, the caster is free to specify any action to be taken by the target (the target's classes and special abilities can be fully understood and used effectively). However, the caster may not perform any action that would endanger the target (e.g., casting a spell that would put the target in danger, walking them over a cliff, etc.).

The target awakens at the end of its turn.
spells.summary: Manipulate an unconscious target

spells.name: Peaceful Nature
spells.description:
This spell only affects Animals or Plants.

The affected targets are rendered harmless and stop fighting for the next hour.

The targets can perform Evasion checks and resistance checks as usual, even during the effect. If the affected character is attacked by another character or a character takes hostile action against the target, the effect of this spell immediately ends for all targets.
spells.summary: Pacifies a plant or animal

spells.name: Three Shot Lightning
spells.description:
Simultaneously fires three bolts of [Lightning] (4th level Truespeech spell). The direction of firing each bolt can be chosen independently, and two or three bolts can be bundled together.

In Simplified Combat, this spell always bundles all three bolts together and releases them in one direction. The Power of this attack is always 30.

In Standard Combat, the caster can choose to fire three bolts together in one direction or bundle two bolts together and fire one shot to each side. Three bolts bundled together have a Power of 30, two bolts bundled together have a Power of 25, and only one bolt has a Power of 20.

In Advanced Combat, the caster can fire a bundle in any direction and in any combination they wish. The base Power per bolt is 20, but if multiple bolts pass through the same coordinates, the Power increases by +5 for each additional bolt.
spells.summary: Fires 3 lightning bolts with Power 20, Power +5 per bundle

spells.name: Reaping Slash
spells.description: Conjures a slashing blade out of thin air, which deals Power 20 + Magic Power magical damage to the target.
spells.summary: Deals Power 20 damage

spells.name: ⏩Tear Gas Bullet
spells.description: Creates a bullet which produces an irritant gas upon impact. The bullet does not cause damage even if it hits the target. However, the struck character will experience violent coughing and will have difficulty keeping their eyes open. After being hit, all skill checks are penalized by 2 points for 10 seconds (1 round). This effect is treated as a Poison type.
spells.summary: Creates a tear gas bullet

spells.name: Sink
spells.description:
The target's natural buoyancy is lost, causing them to sink into the water. The target descends with a Movement Speed of 20m per round, sinking until they reach the seabed. The target does not suffer any falling damage when it lands on the bottom of the water. The target can move about on the seabed but cannot float up. Swim checks will fail automatically while under this spell.

This spell has no effect on characters with the racial ability [Sword's Grace/Gentle Water].
spells.summary: Drowns the target

spells.name: Fireport
spells.description: Wraps the target in fire without dealing damage and teleports it. The caster determines the destination within 1km of the target. The destination must have enough space for the target to fit.
