spells.summary: Animate and command an Undead

spells.name: Summon Insects*
spells.description:
Conjures poisonous and stinging insects around the target.

The target is dealt Power 10 + Magic Power damage at the end of the caster's turn. This damage cannot be critical.

If the target is subject to Water/Ice, Wind, Earth, Bludgeoning, or Energy type spells, the insects will be driven away, and this spell's effect will end.
spells.summary: Deals Power 10 damage per round

spells.name: Purify Soul
spells.description:
This spell is only effective on Undead monsters of Level 13 or lower. The target's soul is redeemed, and departs to the god of the caster's faith. In the physical world, the Undead dies instantly.

If the target's monster level is 14 or higher, this magic's Resistance becomes "Optional."
spells.summary: Bring peace to the souls of the dead

spells.name: ⏩Reproducer/Bloody Petal
spells.description: The target receives Bloody Petal's [◯Regeneration] ability. The target automatically regains 5 points of HP at the end its turns until the spell expires. The spell also ends if the target's HP falls to 0 or below.
spells.summary: Target gains ability to heal 5 HP each round

spells.name: Resurrection
spells.description:
This can only be cast on a corpse, which will return to life if successful (see CR I, p. 185). The Target Number for this spell equals the days elapsed since death.

The target corpse for this spell must have its major organs intact. The head and spine must be intact for Humanoid and Barbarous corpses.

This spell takes one hour to cast.
spells.summary: Brings back the soul of the dead and returns them to life

spells.name: Abyssal Leap
spells.description:
The caster teleports to the target location. This spell will not work unless the location is in the Shallow Abyss or a similar environment.

This spell can only be cast once per round.

After the leap, the caster suffers a -2 penalty to Accuracy and Evasion checks for 10 seconds (1 round).

Enhancement 1:

The penalty after teleporting is removed.

Enhancement 2:

This spell can be cast as a Minor Action.

If cast as a Minor Action, it can still only be cast once per round and must be cast before moving. After casting, it is treated as if a Limited Move has been performed.
spells.summary: Leap to a specified location within the Shallow Abyss

spells.name: Daemon's Sense
spells.description: Transforms the Warlock's ears and eyes into those of a Daemon. The caster gains [Darkvision] for the duration of the effect and gains a +2 bonus to Listen and Danger Sense Checks.
spells.summary: Gains [Darkvision], Listen and Danger Checks +2

spells.name: Daemon's Snap
spells.description:
Summons a great demon from the Abyss Gate for a very short time. The caster must be in the same location (area, coordinates) as the Abyss Gate that they opened to cast this spell. When this spell is cast, the Daemon Lada Adroda will be summoned. This Daemon will then performs one action from the Daemon Action Chart (see Monstrous Lore, p. 46). The action is determined by rolling 1d. The action can be canceled immediately after the 1d roll by spending an additional 16 MP points.

The Lada Adroda will act (or have their action canceled) immediately after this spell is cast and will be banished to the Abyss Gate right after. No Summoning Sacrifice or Banish Tribute is required, and no MP will be refunded.
spells.summary: Summons the Daemon Lada Adroda and makes them act

spells.name: Advanced Healing
spells.description:
Restores the target's HP by (caster's Magic Power + 8) points.

Note: Fairy Magic of the Light type has no effect on Constructs, Magitech, or Undead.
spells.summary: Restore the target's HP by (Magic Power + 8) points

spells.name: ⏩Multiple Actor/Giant Crab
spells.description:
The target gains the Giant Crab's [►Twin Strike & Double Attack] ability. During its turn, the target may make a weapon attack and then immediately make a second attack. The target may choose to attack the same or a different target. This additional attack can only be made once, and the spell immediately ends once made. This additional attack does not trigger [Chain Attack], [Stomp], [◯Continuous Attack], or similar effects. If the target is a character with multiple sections, this effect is lost once it is triggered on any of the sections. The spell also ends automatically at the end of the target's turn.

Active combat feats with "Application: 1 … attack" only apply to the first attack and not to additional attacks due to this spell. However, it is possible to declare a feat for an additional attack as long as it is legal (for example, by using the [Ever-Changing I] Combat Feat).

This is a "Symbolic Lore" spell (see Monstrous Lore p. 17).
spells.summary: Target can attack twice

spells.name: Telescope
spells.description: The magisphere transforms into a telescope, allowing the caster to see details up to 100m (with a small magisphere)/300m (medium)/1km (large) away.
spells.summary: Creates a telescope to see far distances

spells.name: Purification Wave
spells.description:
The Spirit of Megalomor releases a wave that frees everyone from all effects.

The Success Value of this casting spell check is used to compare the results, and all effects that have lower Success Values are canceled. Effects of Poison or Disease type are removed regardless of the result of the Success Value comparison.

This spell can only be cast once per day.
spells.summary: Remove all effects for Poison and Disease types

spells.name: Air Walking
spells.description: The target can walk or run on air as if it is solid ground. If the target falls prone while in the air, they remain in place and do not fall on the ground.
spells.summary: Target can move in the air

spells.name: Forget
spells.description:
The target immediately forgets everything that has happened over the past week, including the memory of losing their memories.

When this spell ends, the missing memories immediately return.

This does not cause the loss of class levels or Combat Feats.
spells.summary: Robs the target of memories

spells.name: Insanity
spells.description: The target suffers one of a variety of mental effects. Roll 2d and consult the following table:
spells.power_table:
2d Effect
2-4 The target goes berserk, gaining a +2 bonus on Accuracy checks and a -2 penalty on Evasion checks for 30 seconds (3 rounds). During this time, the target cannot perform rational actions, and even if their intellect is "Average" or "High," it is treated as "Low." The target also cannot cast spells at all.
5-9 The target's Intelligence is significantly reduced: for 3 minutes (18 rounds), the Intelligence score is reduced by 12 points (to a minimum of 1). In the case of a fixed value character, all values that the GM determines to be based on Intelligence, such as Magic Power, are reduced by 2 points.
10-12 The target's will to act is significantly reduced; they may not take any Major Actions for 30 seconds (3 rounds). They may still move, take Minor Actions, or declare active combat feats.
spells.summary: Makes the target temporarily insane

spells.name: Eagle Vision
spells.description:
When casting the spell, Eagle's Spirit appears, rising to 100 meters above the caster and giving the caster a view from there.

For the duration of the effect, the caster can see and comprehend a radius of 1km from the center of the caster's own body from the sky. The caster can perform a Search check at any point within this radius if desired. The GM can also make the caster perform a Notice check. The druid may use their own Nature Magic Power as their Standard Value for these checks.

This spell can be used only when the caster is in the open and the Spirit can rise 100 meters above the ground unobstructed. Also, while the spell is in effect, the caster cannot perform any movement (change of area or coordinates). If the caster moves (even if they are forced to do so), the spell ends.
spells.summary: Caster gains a bird's eye view of a 1km radius

spells.name: Sunlight*
spells.description: Creates a golden sphere of light which removes penalties due to darkness within all areas (20m radius). This spell can be placed on an object which can be carried and moved.
spells.summary: Illuminate a 20-meter radius with light

spells.name: Holy Cradle
spells.description: The targets fall into a healing slumber. This magical sleep is equivalent to 6 hours of normal sleep. If the target is awakened during the spell's duration, there is no restoration from sleep. The same target can receive the effects of this spell a maximum of twice per day.
spells.summary: Induce deep sleep and enhance the restorative effects of sleep

spells.name: Masking
spells.description:
Hides the target from everyone's perception. All other characters are treated as if they are under the [Mind Blank] spell.

When the target encounters a new character, this character needs to make a Willpower check versus the Spellcasting check when the spell was cast. On a success, the spell immediately ends. This spell works without a Willpower check for characters with an adventurer level or monster level less than or equal to the caster's Fairy Tamer level -4.

This spell doesn't work on characters immune to Psychic-type effects, regardless of their level. However, the spell will not end in this case.

Any aggressive actions from the caster towards any other character (touch, attack, targeting with a spell, etc.) will end the spell just before the action is resolved. The level difference is not taken into account in this case.
spells.summary: Hides target

spells.name: Fair Price*
spells.description:
The caster can determine the monetary value of the target. The caster can determine its base price if the item has been published in rulebooks, supplements, or other sources.

The caster can obtain an approximate average value for items whose market price fluctuates significantly depending on factors such as time of year and availability.

If the target is a fake or has some other impediment to its value, and this is known by the caster, the caster can determine the fair price by subtracting (or adding) the impediment value.

If an object is damaged or has an extremely high added or scarcity value, this spell can only show its value as "unknown."

Note that this spell does not work on living creatures or characters.
spells.summary: Shows the monetary value of goods

spells.name: ⏩Quick Loader
spells.description: The magisphere transforms into an autoloader mechanism. One gun in the caster's possession is automatically loaded with as many bullets as it can hold from the caster's inventory.
spells.summary: Connects caster's gun with their inventory, automatically loading it

spells.name: ⏩△Analyze
spells.description:
The magisphere transforms into an analyzer, allowing the caster to learn the abilities, effects, and uses of Magitech Civilization-era items. It also shows the data of Magitech monsters. However, it will not reveal their weak point.

This spell can be cast during Combat Preparation. This spell can only be cast once per item or monster, and to receive a monster's data it must be cast before the Monster Knowledge check.
spells.summary: Analyzes a monster's body or a machine's structure

spells.name: Energy Javelin
spells.description: Compresses mana into a spear, which then hurls itself at the target and deals Power 40 + Magic Power magical damage.
spells.summary: Deals Power 40 damage

spells.name: Gain Trust*
spells.description:
This spell attempts to convince the target that the caster is a trustworthy counterparty.

The target will treat the caster as if they were a long-time, trusted business partner. They will never question the caster's offers of deals, profits, or business. Additionally, the target may reveal secrets of other business partners, share movements of goods, and make promises that a businessman would only make to a trusted partner. They will not question the drafting of contracts.

Note that this spell only affects commercial transactions and has no effect on treaties and agreements in other areas.
spells.summary: Convince that caster is a trusted trading partner

spells.name: Freeze
spells.description: The target is hit with a tremendous blast of cold air, weakening it. The target is dealt Power 40 + Magic Power magic damage. In addition, the target takes a -4 penalty on all skill checks for the next 10 seconds (1 round).
spells.summary: Deals Power 40 damage, -4 on Skill Checks

spells.name: Blast the Wall*
spells.description:
This spell destroys walls up to 50cm thick, regardless of material. The height and width destroyed are 3m and 10m, respectively.

Magically erected walls (see Magus Arts, p. 76) are also removed without comparing Success Values.

This spell cannot destroy characters or inflict damage on them.
spells.summary: Breaks down walls

spells.name: †Sacred Shield
spells.description:
This spell gives the target protection against impurity.

The target takes -3 physical damage from attacks by Barbarous and Undead characters.
spells.summary: Reduces damage received from Barbarous and Undead by -3

spells.name: Binding Thorn*
spells.description:
A mana-woven thorn vine extends from the earth and tangles around the target to weaken it.

The target takes a -1 penalty on Accuracy checks and Evasion checks for the duration of the effect.

At casting, if the success value of the spell exceeds the target's Willpower value by 5 or more, the duration is extended to 3 minutes (18 rounds). If the target makes an automatic success while resisting this spell, the effect lasts for 10 seconds (1 round), and the spell is considered Resistance: Temporary.
spells.summary: Accuracy and Evasion -1

spells.name: Set Disguise
spells.description:
Caster changes their appearance to resemble another Humanoid or Barbarous individual whom they know. The caster can change their face, features, and even their body type. At a glance, they are indistinguishable from the selected Humanoid.

Anyone trying to see through the disguise must roll a Detect check.
spells.summary: Disguises the caster instantly, appearing to be another person entirely

spells.name: Flare
spells.description: Emits a flash of light that blinds everyone in the target area. Characters will be blinded for the next 10 seconds (1 round). This spell has no effect on characters with magic perception.
spells.summary: Emits a flash of light that blinds everyone

spells.name: Cure Injury
spells.description: Heals the target for Power 50 + Magic Power HP. This spell has no effect on Constructs or Magitech. If the target is Undead, this spell deals Power 50 + Magic Power damage instead.
spells.summary: Heals target with Power 50

spells.name: Mindread
spells.description:
The caster can ask one and only one question to the target immediately after casting this spell, and read the answer that comes to the target's mind. The target cannot lie.

The caster must specify exactly what they want to know. The question can either be a simple yes/no question, or start with one of these words: "When?", "Why?", "Where?", "Who?", or "How?". The question should be simple enough to be answered directly. Questions that are ambiguous and open to multiple interpretations will most likely lead to unclear or misleading answers.

If the questioned individual truly believes a complete falsehood, they will respond as it the falsehood is the truth.
spells.summary: Read the answer that comes to the mind of the target

spells.name: ⏩Presage Disaster*
spells.description:
This spell predicts which targets will be affected by a random selection of targets.

When cast, one character is randomly determined from all the characters (sections) within range, including the caster, who cannot exclude themselves.

Once if an effect that randomly determines a target occurs, this spell makes the person affected by the spell as the target, regardless of the dice roll.

The caster may cancel the [Presage Disaster] spell (MP is still consumed) if the target of this magical effect is undesirable.

This spell can only be used once per round, and its effect is lost once it is exerted.

Effects that randomly determine the target include the [Fall Lightning] spell, Aspects of the Geomancer class, and shots fired into a skirmish by someone without [Targeting].
spells.summary: Predicts the effect of random target selection

spells.name: Jealousy*
spells.description:
The target becomes jealous of every character around them, especially family, partners, and close friends, and will explicitly and vociferously express this newfound feeling.

During the effect time, the target cannot perform any actions to assist or support other characters (regardless of its own gain or loss, advantage or disadvantage).
spells.summary: Makes the target jealous of all those around them

spells.name: Balance Weapon
spells.description: Applies [Dull Weapon] (1st level Truespeech spell) to one target and [Enchant Weapon] (1st level Spiritualism spell) to another target. If [Blunt Weapon] is ineffective due to the target's Willpower check, [Enchant Weapon] is also ineffective.
spells.summary: -4 physical damage to enemies and +1 to allies

spells.name: Twister
spells.description: Creates a tornado which hoists the target into the air, then throws it out to a location specified by the caster. The target can be anywhere within the caster's line of sight within 30m (in Simplified Combat, the target is limited to the rearguard area of the target's faction or the frontline area). The target suffers a fixed 30 points of falling damage when they impact the ground.
spells.summary: Rolls the target in a tornado and throws it out

spells.name: Blast
spells.description: Caster smashes the target with a ball of mana, dealing Power 30 + Magic Power magic damage to the target.
spells.summary: Deals Power 30 damage

spells.name: Mind Crush
spells.description:
Target's Intelligence and Spirit are both reduced by 12 points. The standard value of checks such as Magic Power and Willpower are also reduced by the reduction of the ability score, and the maximum value of MP is also reduced. If this effect reduces Intelligence or Spirit to 0 (they cannot be less than 0), the target will be stunned, unable to move or act in any way.

For fixed-value characters, all values that the GM determines to be based on Intelligence or Spirit, such as Magic Power or Willpower, are reduced by 2 points.
spells.summary: Target's Intelligence and Spirit -12

spells.name: Maelstrom
spells.description: Creates a maelstrom, dealing Power 40 + Magic Power magic damage to the target. If the target is underwater, the damage is increased by 5 points. This additional damage occurs even if the effect target succeeds in resisting.
spells.summary: Deals Power 40 damage

spells.name: ⏩Reproducer/Living Tree
spells.description: The target is given Living Tree's [◯Regeneration] ability. Target automatically regains 10 points of HP at the end of its turn while the spell is in effect. The spell ends if the target's HP falls to 0 or below.
spells.summary: Target gains ability to heal 10 HP each round

spells.name: ⏩△Completion*
spells.description:
The caster temporarily gains the ability to cast up to 10th-level spells of one of Truespeech, Spiritualism, or Fairy Magic. The Magic Power for any of those spells becomes the caster's Priest Class level + Intelligence Modifier.

Temporarily learned spells do not require any movement, vocalization, magical implement, or Fairy Tamer's Gem to be cast. However, if an individual spell requires a special cost (such as a mako stone for [Summon Fairy]), it must be provided. All combat feats that the caster has mastered are valid. [MP Save/**] is applied if it matches the chosen magic system.

Spells that take more than 10 seconds to cast cannot be cast.

Once the chosen spell is cast, the effect of this spell ends.
spells.summary: Temporarily learn magic by seeing through Kilhia's eyes

spells.name: Summon Fairy III
spells.description: This spell is identical to [Summon Fairy], except the monster level of the fairy to be called is 7.
spells.summary: Calls and uses a level 7 Fairy

spells.name: Restore Health
spells.description:
Removes any Poison- or Disease-type effects that the target currently suffers without contested checks.

Note: Fairy Magic of the Light type has no effect on Constructs, Magitech, or Undead.
spells.summary: Heals poison and disease

spells.name: Handle Fairy
spells.description:
With their in-depth knowledge of fairies, the caster is prepared to anticipate their actions.

For the spell's duration, the caster gains a +2 bonus on Evasion, Willpower, and Fortitude checks when targeted by fairy monster attacks or unique skills.
spells.summary: Gives +2 bonus to Evasion, Willpower, and Fortitude checks against Fairies

spells.name: Steal Memory
spells.description:
The caster can remove a specific memory from the target so that the target never even knows they had the memory taken from them.

The caster chooses when to begin to take a memory and how long the memory they're taking is, then spends an equal amount of time casting this spell. The caster steals the memory in increments of 10 seconds (1 round) at a time, even if the memory they're taking isn't that long. Afterward, the caster will be able to recall the memory as if it were their own, and the target will lose the memory completely.

If this spell's effect ends, the target recovers all of their stolen memories. This does not cause the caster to lose the memory.
spells.summary: Acquires a memory from the target

spells.name: Acid Cloud
spells.description: Turns the air in the target area into acidic fumes and deals Power 20 + Magic Power damage.
spells.summary: Deals Power 20 damage

spells.name: △Sharp Eye/Giant Eagle
spells.description:
Caster gains the Giant Eagle Spirit's keen eyes and movement and has its initiative in battle.

Caster changes the Success Value of their Initiative check to 18 if the result is less than 18. If the caster rolls 2 on Initiative, automatic failure does not occur, and no experience points are gained as a result.

Note: [Sharp Eye/**] affects the Monster Knowledge and Initiative checks performed during Combat Preparation. This spell may be cast after checking the results of other characters belonging to the same faction. It is generally more effective for the game to proceed smoothly by allowing players to select or discard factors that might affect Monster Knowledge and Initiative checks during Combat Preparation, not just this spell after the results of other characters are determined.
spells.summary: Guaranteed 18 Success Value on Initiative check

spells.name: Sacred Bandage*
spells.description:
A holy bandage appears and wraps around the target's wound, instantly healing it.

This bandage can remove any one effect of the Poison, Disease or Curse type that the target is experiencing without requiring a Success Value comparison.
spells.summary: Remove disadvantageous effects of Poison, Disease, and Curse types

spells.name: Teleport
spells.description:
Moves the target to either a place the caster has previously been or a place within sight up to 1km away. The target size can be no larger than 1m radius or 2m high. The spell ignores walls, shields, and other obstructions, but will fail if there is no safe place for the object to exist at the destination.

If a character is the spell's target, it is considered "Target: 1 Character X" (see p. 74).

This spell does not affect items held or equipped by other characters.
spells.summary: Instantly moves the target to a location of the caster's choice

spells.name: Revenant Curse
spells.description:
If the target dies after casting this spell, they gain 5 soulscars temporarily and will rise as a Revenant (see CR I, p. 416, or ML, p. 133). Target follows the caster's orders completely.

Once the duration of this spell ends, the target is fully and permanently a Revenant and cannot be resurrected. However, if the spell is canceled via [Remove Curse] before then, all soulscars will disappear, and the body will become a normal corpse.
spells.summary: Allows the living to rise as a Revenant upon death

spells.name: Transfer HP*
spells.description: The caster can transfer from 1 to 30 HP from themselves, restoring twice as much to the target. If there is more than one target in range, HP will be divided equally between them (rounded down).
spells.summary: Transfer caster's HP to target

spells.name: Dull Weapon
spells.description: Weakens the target, reducing the physical damage of a target's melee or ranged attacks by 4.
spells.summary: Reduce the target's physical damage by -4

spells.name: Defense Master
spells.description:
The target temporarily learns one of the following Combat Feats: [Armor Proficiency A/**], [Cover I], [Defensive Stance], [Evasive Maneuvers I], or [Block], chosen by the caster.

This spell exceptionally can be cast repeatedly on the same target, allowing the target to use multiple feats.
spells.summary: Temporarily give the target a Combat Feat

spells.name: Fairy Support
spells.description:
At any point during the spell's duration, the target may call upon a fairy for aid and receive a +2 bonus on any skill check. The request can be made immediately after this spell is successfully cast.

Once the target asks a fairy for aid, the spell ends.

This spell cannot increase the number of targets with combat feat [Metamagic/Targets]. Also, while this spell is in effect, the caster cannot cast any other Fairy Magic. If the caster has cast [Fairy Wish] or [Fairy Wish II] spells, they will be automatically canceled by this spell.
spells.summary: Makes the Fairy provide substantial assistance

spells.name: Familiar II
spells.description:
Create a Construct that will serve as an Advanced Familiar. See Familiars II for monster data, and Common Abilities of Advanced Familiars for information about Advanced Familiars in general.

Casting this spell takes one hour.
spells.summary: Create an intelligent familiar

spells.name: Fireball
spells.description: Shoots a ball of fire that explodes on impact, dealing Power 20 + Magic Power magical damage.
spells.summary: Deals Power 20 damage

spells.name: Absorb Magic
spells.description:
After taking magical damage, the caster recovers MP equal to the damage received. This effect disappears once activated.

This spell can only be cast once per day.
spells.summary: Turns magical damage into MP

spells.name: ⏩Omega Shooter
spells.description: Creates a weapon similar to the [Pile Shooter], except now called the "Omega Shooter," a Power 100 weapon.
spells.summary: Create a high-speed shooting weapon (Power 100)

spells.name: Ice Bolt
spells.description: Shoots an ice arrow at the target, dealing Power 10 + Magic Power magic damage.
spells.summary: Deals Power 10 damage

spells.name: Holy Blessing
spells.description:
A force field protects the target. This force field has 30 HP and takes all the physical, magical, and fixed damage that the target suffers to its HP (hereafter in this description, referred to as "damage").

The damage is first applied to this force field when the target is damaged. When dealing damage to this extra HP, Defense is treated as 0, and damage cannot be reduced. The HP of the force field cannot be recovered by any means. It disappears when the HP reaches zero.

If the target receives more damage than the remaining extra HP, the extra damage will be dealt to the target's actual HP. Defense and other damage reductions will apply to the remaining damage.

A target can only be affected by this spell once per day.
spells.summary: Provides protection of 30 HP

spells.name: Water Edge
spells.description: Attacks the target with a watery blade, dealing Power 40 + Magic Power magic damage.
spells.summary: Deals Power 40 damage

spells.name: Detect Enemy*
spells.description:
The caster becomes aware of any hostility in their surroundings. They are able to discern the direction of any hostile characters within range, as well as the direction of any characters with a "Disposition: Hostile" label. If there are multiple characters, the caster is able to detect them all.

However, the caster does not know the exact distance to these characters, nor do they know the specific number of characters in the same direction.

It is important to note that characters who are detected by this spell are unaware of it unless they possess special magic-sensing abilities or items, see the caster, or hear the caster's voice when the spell is cast.
spells.summary: Know the direction of any hostile characters
